title: Service Shop & Equipment Maintenance: Yearly Monthly Daily?

subtasks: Change oil, transmission, and hydraulic fluids.
Replace bucket teeth and cutting edges for efficiency.

subtasks: Install new tires on the road grader.

tasks.task: and then the list of subtasks under each.

However, if they are going to use the barn for regular maintenance of their equipment (which they don't have time to do during the year), that is a long-term benefit but the act of building the barn is a single task. So maybe keep it as one MAINTASK for building the barn.
